text: Irene Hernández de Jesús (20 October 1958 – 4 April 2021) was a Mexican mixe teacher, activist and politician. She was a pioneer and president of women's political participation in the Mixe region of Oaxaca in Mexico.Fallece la maestra Irene Hernández, primera presidenta municipal en la región Mixe y este es su legadoMuere Irene Hernández de Jesús, la primera presidenta municipal mixe de Oaxaca Hernández de Jesús died on 4 April 2021, aged 62. ==References== Category:Mexican activists Category:Mexican educators Category:1958 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Oaxaca Category:Place of death missing
title: Irene Hernández de Jesús
